subject: Web3
title: The Colonial Pipeline Recovery
description: Learn The Colonial Pipeline Recovery in one minute.

hook.text: In 2021, ransomware hackers shut down the largest US fuel pipeline. They demanded 75 Bitcoin â€” about $4.4 million.

buildup.text: Colonial Pipeline paid the ransom to restore operations. Gas shortages caused panic buying across the East Coast.

discovery.text: The FBI traced the Bitcoin through the blockchain and seized 63.7 of the 75 coins within a month.

twist.text: The FBI had obtained the private key to the hackers' wallet. How they got it remains partially classified.

climax.text: The recovery proved that Bitcoin ransom payments can be reversed. Crypto is not the safe haven criminals assumed.

punchline.text: Hackers demanded Bitcoin because it's untraceable. The FBI traced it in weeks.

quiz.question: How did the FBI recover most of the Colonial Pipeline ransom?
options: They traced the Bitcoin and obtained the private key to the hackers' wallet
